post.body: I'm a big fan of pot pies. Pls come over here to test ur moms recipe:-)
thanks! I'm watching now.
I suffer from flatulence of the head and cannot keep pace with ur wit.
don't you have some reading to do, missy?
yay! I found poppers!!
Ankur recommends using Senuti program
is it possible to sync an iPod with a laptop with the sync direction from iPod to laptop?
Camille volunteers her computer but I think the sync will put her iTunes on ur iPod, not the direction u want it. Burn to DVD?
did you go to EXPRESS for you glitter glow?
gross! U best shower before coming over;-)
just consulted w Camille-- she doesn't feel strongly about adding to the music list--wants to go with urs.
so is Camille... I think that's why I find ur presence very calming :-)
We are about to head off . Eta in Pdx is 3:30.
checck out the mobile photo on my facebook.
sweet! Merry Christmas from the slopes of timberline lodge.
happy anniversary!
save me some!!
omg! We forgot Apples to Apples-- Andra's gonna freak!
googley rocks the vest! Ori is jealous. I'll send u a pic today:-)
what's the patron saint for long car rides in the snow?
drive safely and wish your family a Merry Christmas from us.
Xmas tree shopping...but where to go in this snow storm?
Happy to see snow and read Nick Kristoff's blog where he mentions World Pulse... yay! kristof.blogs.nytimes.com
Do people really care about receiving holiday Xmas cards?
Goal of the day: snow angel in Washington park.
Getting ready for a tastey crab dinner.
Is having a pint at Green Dragon before picking up the bike.
Working on my vintage bike
Reading Deep Economy by Bill McKibben.
just read Naomi Klien's speech (U of Chicago)- an exquisite and dead-on explanation about the state of economics as we've come to know it.
Si! Si se puede!!
Yes we can!
We're going to get free coffee at starbucks ... Wanna come?
8:30 pm tomorrow watch Billy 1979 bilJoel concert filmed in UK.
The sauna and the steam bath really wiped me out... I need a pick me up.
"seeing red and feeling blue"
Just learned that a gallon of milk in the AK bush costs $17!
is listening to podcasts and doing a puzzle... ahh, I love holiday breaks!!
Heading to the mountains on slushy streets.
Listening to the "Avec Fromage SVP" mix and cheesin' hard.
